version_description:
• Added jadual gaji kakitangan awam
• Added zoom function to calendar
• Improved clarity of calendar
• User interface tweaks

• Added 2017 calendar
• Added list of public holidays
• Added week numbers to 2017 calendar
• Added jadual gaji kakitangan awam 2017
• Added school holiday (festive)
• Changed of Agong's Birthday public holiday to 29 July

• Updated calendar with Hari Raya school holiday on 23rd June
• Changed of Awal Muharram date and updated Islamic calendar

• 最高元首诞辰更换至9月9日
• 增加应用内购买以移除广告功能
• Added 2018 calendar (school holiday will be added after announcement by the government)

• Added 2018 calendar (school holiday will be added after announcement by the government)
• In order to reduce the size of the app and to save the space of your phone storage, calendar of older months for the year of 2017 are available online
• Added 2018 school holidays

• Added "jadual gaji kakitangan awam 2018"
• Changed of Sarawak Governor's Birthday holiday from 9 Sep 2018 to 13 Oct 2018

• Added school holiday for festivals 2018
• Change of Raja Perlis' Birthday holiday from 17th May to 17th July
• Added "tarikh bayaran pencen 2018"

• Supported iPhone X
• Added General Election public holiday
• Added today date
• Added post-election public holiday

• Change of government servants' July salary payment date to 18th July
• Bug fix
• Fixed "today date" bug
• Updated pension pay dates
Added 2019 calendar (school holidays will be added after announcement by the government)

• Corrected missing date of 29 May 2019
• Added long weekends, school holidays, Islamic festival, Chinese festivals, SOCSO payment schedules
Added school holidays 2019

• Set public holidays reminders from Settings tab
• Corrected error in Chinese lunar calendar
• Change of goverment servant December pay date to 18 Dec
Added jadual gaji 2019

• Added jadual pencen 2019
• Set the government servants' salary payment, pension payment, the first and fifteen day of Chinese lunar month reminders from Settings tab
• Updated SOCSO payment schedule to 2019

• Added 2020 calendar
• Updated pension payment date
• Bug fix

• Added Coronation of Agong public holiday
• Change of Sultan of Pahang's Birthday (Pahang state holiday) from 24th Oct to 30th July

• Updated calendar 2020
• Added holidays 2020 schedule

• Added 2020 long weekends
• Added Chinese zodiac under schedules
• Added school holidays 2020
Added jadual gaji 2020

• Fixed crash when changing to October 2020
• Added 2020 pension schedule

• Added Christmas Eve holiday for Sabah
• Changed of Sultan of Kedah's Birthday from 19 January to 21 June 2020
Added 2020 SOCSO schedule
Updated Chinese zodiac information for the year of rat
Change of Agong's birthday from June 6 to June 8
Updated school holidays for August and December
Added 2021 calendar
Configure whether to enable note calendar in Settings tab

• Added note reminder function
• Added long weekend 2021
• Removed all full screen advertisement
• Bug fix
Added 2021 school holiday

• Added 2021 school holiday for Chinese New Year, Hari Raya and Deevapali
• Added reminder function for pay day, pension payment, first and fifteen day of Chinese Lunar Calendar
Bug fix
Updated jadual gaji 2021

• Added jadual pencen 2021
• Updated public holidays 2021 schedule
• Updated reminder for 2021
Updated 2021 SOCSO payment schedule
Updated Chinese zodiac for 2021
